sphericalBillboard

public void sphericalBillboard(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable gldraw,
                               Vect3d p)
Executes the proper glRotatef command to rotate an object so it faces the camera (Billboarding). This assumes object is initially facing down the -Z axis.

Parameters:
gldraw - gl jogl object
p - position of object
